chargeHist.descr: Operating a Motor Vehicle Without Owner's Consent, Repeater

result.execSummary:
The defendant Melissa Marie Kurth was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.23(2).
  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 (Jackson County Case 15CF163) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime, Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 (Jackson County Case 15CF63) [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer (Jackson County Case 15CF63) [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent to current sentence.  05/03/16: Court amends ES from 4 years to 3 years, concurrent on all.

superMiscConds.notes: Restitution ordered: $1143.48 - K&K Car Wash; $537.82 - Eleva Car Wash; $168.13 - restitution surcharge (Trempealeau County Case No. 15CF87 Read In - Joint and Several with Shane Couillard, Trempealeau County Case No. 15CF78) $557 - Alma Center Feed Mill; $55.70 - restitution surcharge (Jackson County Case No. 15CF163 Read In - Joint and several with Dean Olson, Jr.).  $156 - C.G.; $15.60 - restitution surcharge (Jackson County Case No. 15CF63 Read In).
Defendant to pay court costs and DNA Surcharge.
Defendant to have no contact with Shane Couillard, co-defendants in this case, or victims.
Defendant is to comply with any treatment/programming as deemed appropriate by the COMPAS assessment and agent.
